Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign

This package contains implementation objects used for executing the assign activity.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeAssignOperation Interface for a single operation nested within an
IAeCopyOperation Interface for the standard copy operation implementation.
IAeCopyOperationContext The context for the copy operation.
IAeCopyStrategy Provides the interface for copying data returned from a impl to a impl
IAeCopyStrategyFactory An interface for copy operation strategy factories.
IAeFrom Interface for an impl object that knows how to extract data from an AeFromDef
IAeMessageVariableWrapper Wrapper interface for a message variable returned from a or targeted by a
IAePropertyAliasCopyOperation Interface for copy operation components that use property aliases to select the data for the source or target.
IAeTo Interface for an impl object that knows how to get the target for a copy operation
IAeVariableDataWrapper Interface used to wrap a variable that is being assigned to.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractCopyStrategyFactoryImpl Base factory used to create IAeCopyStrategy instances.
AeAbstractCopyStrategyFactoryImpl.AeStrategyIndex Simple struct with getters and setters for the from and to specs and data
AeAtomicCopyOperationContext The context for the copy operation.
AeBPWSCopyStrategyFactoryImpl BPWS version of a copy strategy factory.
AeCopyOperation Impl of copy operation for activity.
AeCopyOperationBase Abstract implementation of copy operation for activity.
AeCopyOperationComponentBase Base class for copy operation components like and variant implementations.
AeCopyOperationComponentFactory Base class for creating copy operation impl objects like specific versions of a or variant
AeCopyOperationContext The context for the copy operation.
AeCopyStrategyFactory Factory used to create IAeCopyStrategy instances.
AeCreateXPathUtil Util for creating xml constructs within a DOM to satisfy an XPath query
AeMessageVariableWrapper Wrapper object for the message variable.
AePropertyAliasBasedSelector Selects a value from a variable using a property alias.
AeVirtualCopyOperation Impl of copy operation for activity used in virtual copy.
AeWSBPELCopyStrategyFactoryImpl A WSBPEL version of a copy strategy factory.
 

Exception Summary
AeMismatchedAssignmentException Exception for the standard BPEL fault bpel:mismatchedAssignmentFailure
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign Description

This package contains implementation objects used for executing the assign activity.
